verbs.description: I [V: will] look forward to Trump declaring sometime soon , " Nobody knew diplomacy with a rogue nuclear state could be so complicated . "
[ARG0: I] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: look] forward [ARG1: to Trump declaring sometime soon , " Nobody knew diplomacy with a rogue nuclear state could be so complicated] . "
I will look forward to [ARG0: Trump] [V: declaring] [ARGM-TMP: sometime soon] , " [ARG1: Nobody knew diplomacy with a rogue nuclear state could be so] complicated . "
I will look forward to Trump declaring sometime soon , " [ARG0: Nobody] [V: knew] [ARG1: diplomacy with a rogue nuclear state could be so complicated] . "
I will look forward to Trump declaring sometime soon , " Nobody knew diplomacy with a rogue nuclear state [V: could] be so complicated . "
I will look forward to Trump declaring sometime soon , " Nobody knew [ARG1: diplomacy with a rogue nuclear state] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: be] [ARG2: so complicated] . "
